Description:
Detects a "Get-Process" cmdlet and it's aliases on lsass process, which is in almost all cases a sign of malicious activity

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Get-Process LSASS
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%get-process lsas%' or command like '%ps lsas%' or command like '%gps lsas%')
